EmailTemplate.name: 2020.08.25 - NBS - WFH B2B Social EM 1.2020.08.25 - WFH B2B Social EM 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Make Your Home As Productive As The Office
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Home. As Productive As The Office. Working in comfort is key to working well, so building a proper workspace at home should start with a well-designed office chair and desk. Get Comfortable <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Seating-Chair-Mats/_/N-c1p?cmp={{my.token}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Seating-Chair-Mats/_/N-c1p?cmp={{my.token}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]> <[[https://www.grandandtoy.com/EN/search/pages/browse/Desks/_/N-c4t?cmp={{my.token}}&utm_source={{my.UTM Source}}&utm_medium={{my.UTM Medium}}&utm_content={{my.UTM Content}}&utm_campaign={{my.UTM Campaign}}]]>
